content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment. May I have your name to get started?
It's Mike. Can we just get this done? My AC isn't working.
Thanks, Mike. I understand this is urgent. Can you please provide your address so I can make sure we serve your location and dispatch the right technician?
1432 Hummingbird Lane. Let's not take forever with this.
Thanks, Mike! Let me confirm your address is in our service area while I get the details for your AC issue.
You're within our service area! Can you let me know when would be the best time for a technician to come out, or do you need the earliest available slot?
As soon as you can. It's way too hot in here.
Got it, I'll check for the soonest available HVAC appointment for you right now.
We have an opening later this afternoon between 3:00–5:00 PM. Does that work for you, or would you prefer another time?
That works. Just get someone here, please.
Thank you, Mike. I'm booking your HVAC appointment for today between 3:00–5:00 PM at 1432 Hummingbird Lane. You'll get a reminder before our technician arrives.
